item.title: Help :D
item.dc:creator: @_R_E_B_O_R_N ~R E B O R N~
item.description:
@_R_E_B_O_R_N wrote:

[quote=“pmgz2, post:10, topic:110435”]fix up the brackets though.[/quote]Are you saying you want me to fix the brackets or did you already?

i got these errors:

client.java:1098: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ client.java:1098: case, default, or '}' expected } else { ^ client.java:1099: case, default, or '}' expected sendMessage("You don't have any waterskins to refill."); ^ client.java:1099: case, default, or '}' expected sendMessage("You don't have any waterskins to refill."); ^ client.java:1099: case, default, or '}' expected sendMessage("You don't have any waterskins to refill."); ^ client.java:1099: case, default, or '}' expected sendMessage("You don't have any waterskins to refill."); ^ client.java:1099: case, default, or '}' expected sendMessage("You don't have any waterskins to refill."); ^ client.java:1100: case, default, or '}' expected { ^ client.java:1101: case, default, or '}' expected { ^ client.java:1102: case, default, or '}' expected break; ^ client.java:1102: case, default, or '}' expected break; ^ 11 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

I’m not good with errors. Lol

item.title: Help :D

@pmgz2 wrote:

I explained it the hard way sorry lol
here:

//cactus waterskin refill case 2670: deleteItem(1825, getItemSlot(1825), 1); addItem(1823, 1); sendMessage("You fill The waterskin, now its a Waterskin(1)"); { deleteItem(1827, getItemSlot(1827), 1); addItem(1823, 1); sendMessage("You fill The waterskin, now its a Waterskin(2)"); { deleteItem(1829, getItemSlot(1829), 1); addItem(1823, 1); sendMessage("You fill The waterskin, now its a Waterskin(3)"); { deleteItem(1831, getItemSlot(1831), 1); addItem(1823, 1); sendMessage("You fill The waterskin, now its a Waterskin(4)"); } } else { sendMessage("You don't have any waterskins to refill."); { { break;

fix up the brackets though.

[quote="~R E B O R N~, post:9, topic:110435"]Reported.

[size=6pt]Lol jk, I was acting sarcastic when i said that hehe.[/size][/quote]

lmao.

item.title: Help :D
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

Ya do know you use different cases right? for each item ID…

Lets say 1111 was waterskin 0

in that case you have if you used a knife with a cactus it would delete item id 1111 and replace it with 1112 which is waterskin 1.

then you make another case for 1112, doing a step ahead making it waterskin 2, and etc.

also when you do the code do it like this:

case 2670:
deleteItem(1825, getItemSlot(1825), 1);
addItem(1823, 1);
sendMessage(“w/easdasdas”);
}
break;

end the code! with a } -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Help :D
item.dc:creator: @_R_E_B_O_R_N ~R E B O R N~
item.description:
@_R_E_B_O_R_N wrote:

Well I’m trying to make something and I’m a bit confused lol… I get these errors:

client.java:1097: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ client.java:1097: case, default, or '}' expected } else { ^ client.java:1098: case, default, or '}' expected sendMessage("You don't have any waterskins to refill."); ^ client.java:1098: case, default, or '}' expected sendMessage("You don't have any waterskins to refill."); ^ client.java:1098: case, default, or '}' expected sendMessage("You don't have any waterskins to refill."); ^ client.java:1098: case, default, or '}' expected sendMessage("You don't have any waterskins to refill."); ^ client.java:1098: case, default, or '}' expected sendMessage("You don't have any waterskins to refill."); ^ client.java:1099: case, default, or '}' expected { ^ client.java:1100: case, default, or '}' expected { ^ client.java:1101: case, default, or '}' expected break; ^ client.java:1101: case, default, or '}' expected break; ^ 11 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

And this is what I put in my client.java above

//Search banana tree case.
Ok here it is:

//cactus waterskin refill case 2670: deleteItem(1825, getItemSlot(1825), 1); addItem(1823, 1); { deleteItem(1827, getItemSlot(1827), 1); addItem(1823, 1); { deleteItem(1829, getItemSlot(1829), 1); addItem(1823, 1); { deleteItem(1831, getItemSlot(1831), 1); addItem(1823, 1); { sendMessage("You fill the waterskin with more water, it is now a waterskin(4)."); } } else { sendMessage("You don't have any waterskins to refill."); { { break;

I think I coded something wrong or put in wrong brackets… Idk because I’m tired, I didnt get enough sleep last night.

Read full topic
